title: Engineering Test Technician - Fuel Cell Systems NEW!
full_description: Background:Proof Energy is headquartered in Fremont, CA and was founded in 2018 to commercialize breakthrough metal-supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) technology for Transportation and Stationary applications. We offer competitive salary, healthcare benefits and paid vacation.Position Description:Proof Energy is seeking an exceptional Engineering Test Technician to validate our next generation Power Module products. You are passionate about clean energy and are excited to work on novel technology. You thrive in the fast-paced dynamic environment of a game-changing startup. Join our team to revolutionize the transportation industry.Fabricate prototype components and test fixtures. TIG welding stainless alloys.Install instrumentation test equipment in accordance with engineering specifications and proceduresMaintain test equipment in operating conditionAssist in developing detailed test plans and scripts to validate components.Keep lab organized and consumables stockedSkills & Experience:Education: Associate Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering3+ years industry experience.Hands-on experience with shop equipment, machining, TIG welding.Ability to interpret engineering fabrication drawings and electrical schematicsPassion for teamwork and learning.Team player with a “can-do” attitude.
